title: What are some key historic facts of the Industrial Revolution worldwide? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know the dates right now, but… Invention of the steam engine in 18th C. Europe (Germany / France). Development of standardized parts in Europe. Eli Whitney’s invention of mass production in Connecticut. Eli Whitney’s invention of the Cotton Gin, demonstrated in Southern U.S. Henry Ford’s Model T is first commercial produced automobile (U.S.) Creation of assembly lines in Detroit factories. Improvement and perfection of the tin can. Invention of complex fully-automated assembly lines. Development of nanotextures. Development of 3-d printing technologies using plastic and metal. Development of metamaterials. (Oct 11 2018 physical evidence of perpetual motion by Nathan Coppedge).
